similars.text: And she conceived again, and bare a son: and she said, Now will I praise the Lord: therefore she called his name Judah; and left bearing.
And the child Samuel grew on, and was in favour both with the Lord, and also with men.

verses.text: And the Spirit of the Lord began to move him at times in the camp of Dan between Zorah and Eshtaol.

similars.text: And he went thither to Naioth in Ramah: and the Spirit of God was upon him also, and he went on, and prophesied, until he came to Naioth in Ramah.
